item.title: Report E-2024090081
item.description:
Report E-2024090081

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-03
  • City: SACRAMENTO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 0.5-gallon of UN1263 "High Build Epoxy White" released from a 1-gallon metal pail caused by improper loading and impacted the trailer floor. The terminal personnel had already cleaned the released material. The recovered material, cardboard, and spent oil dri was placed into one (1) 5-gallon metal drum for disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024090063
item.description:
Report E-2024090063

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-06T09:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-30
  • City: SACRAMENTO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-USA contacted ERTS to report a spill of 1-cup Crystalline Potassium Nitrate from a 50lb plastic bag. ERTS dispatched a contractor to assist with cleanup. The contractor arrived on-site and confirmed approximately 1-cup of product were released affecting a 2’x2’ area of the trailer floor. The contractor collected and containerized the Crystalline Potassium Nitrate and all clean-up debris into two (2) 55- gallon drums. All waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
